With the school year at the University of Minnesota over for the summer , Maple Grove Transit has suspended express bus service on Route 789 .
2 when classes for the fall term start for the 2014-15 school year , transit officials said .
In the meantime , for those taking summer courses or need bus service to the U , Maple Grove Transit still operates its other express runs from the northwest suburb to downtown Minneapolis .

Route 798 made two inbound trips on weekdays , leaving the Maple Grove Transit Cente at 7:01 and 8:01 a.m .
The route also made two outbound trips , leaving the U at 2:45 and 4:45 p.m. and traveled via I - 94 to Maple Grove .
